segments.text: Sam , you ’ Ve got to forgive me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I used your computer . And I ’ m afraid I ’ Ve erased your personal files accidentally .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid not . I apologize .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t believe it ! I have all my important personal documents stored in that computer . It ’ s no laughing matter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I told you I ’ m sorry . What can I do to make it up to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you should be sorry ! Don ’ t ever use my computer again ! You can ’ t do anything now , it ’ s too late !
segments.speaker: S2
